page.title: 10Children's Hobbies -1985.
page.content:
We conducted a survey on boys' hobbies. We interviewed 20 boys from the junior department of my school and 13 boys from the infant department. Reading was the most popular - 29 people read, swimming had 23 people, football was third. The trumpet and lamp collecting only had one. Here are the total results of our findings:-
Fishing 10 Reading 29 Cricket 9 Model Aircrafts 6 Football 14 Scouts 13 Stamps 8 Diving 1 Postcards 2 Swimming 23 Trumpet 1 Sailing 2 Piano 3 Collecting Lamps 1 Tennis 4 Motor Bikes 3 Wild Life 2 Football Badges 1 Art 13 Recorder 7 Lego 2
